headline: Assessing Altria Group (MO) Valuation After Recent Price Moves And Income Appeal
summary: Why Altria Group (MO) Is Back on Investor Radars Altria Group (MO) has drawn fresh attention after recent price moves left the stock with a 1 day decline of 0.11%, a 1 week decline of 0.63%, and a month gain of 4.21%. See our latest analysis for Altria Group. At a share price of $61.08, Altria Group’s recent 30 day share price return of 4.21% contrasts with a 90 day share price decline of 5.41%, while the 1 year total shareholder return of 28.83% points to stronger momentum over a longer...
